features: 🌬️PORTABLE COOLING COMPANION: Experience refreshing relief wherever you go with our handheld fan. Designed to be highly compact and portable, this fan measures only 2.6" x 4.1" x 8.3", making it easy to carry and transport. Whether you're on-the-go or at home, you can effortlessly bring this fan along to enjoy a cool breeze wherever you need it most.

🌬️PERSONALIZED COOLING EXPERIENCE: Enhance your comfort with our handheld mini fan that offers 3 adjustable cooling speeds to cater to your specific preferences. From a gentle breeze to a powerful gust, you can easily customize the airflow to meet your cooling needs. The fan is also equipped with a handy LED power indicator, providing you with a convenient way to monitor its operation.

🌬️UNLEASH THE BREEZE WITH EASE: Experience the refreshing airflow of our mini handheld fan without any hassle. Simply charge the fan's powerful built-in lithium-ion battery, and enjoy up to 3 hours of continuous cooling comfort. The fan comes with its own convenient USB charging cable, making it easy to recharge whenever needed. Say goodbye to the limitations of traditional fans and stay cool on the go!

🌬️SPREAD THE JOY OF RELAXATION: Surprise your loved ones with the gift of comfort and relaxation by giving them this mini portable fan. Its sleek and modern minimalist design adds a touch of style to any setting, while its reliable performance ensures a refreshing breeze whenever needed. Whether it's for birthdays, holidays, or just because, this fan is guaranteed to be a hit and bring a smile to anyone's face.

🌬️VERSATILE POWER OPTIONS: This mini handheld fan offers two power options to suit your convenience. It can be powered through a rechargeable USB cable or with the included AA battery. With either option, it can run for up to 3 hours on a single charge, providing you with continuous cooling wherever you go.
body.description: Need to find the perfect handheld fan? Having a personal cooling device is always a must for you. Hot days are very unpredictable and it’s never a bad idea to be prepared for them. The only problem is, most portable fans available for sale are too flimsy and tacky. Some are also built too bulky to wrap your hand around. What you’re specifically looking for is a handheld fan that’s sturdy, powerful, and stylish. Always feel cool and relaxed no matter where you are with the Comfort Zone Handheld Rechargeable Fan. Go about your day comfortably by taking our handheld cooling device. With its lightweight and compact construction, our travel-friendly fan can fit right into your backpack, glove compartment, or satchel. Aside from being a fantastic choice for road trips, nature getaways, and picnics, our handy fan is also great for home or office use. Each personal cooling station includes a base, allowing you to set it up on your desktop without a problem. Last but not least, our portable personal fan is easy to charge via its micro USB charging cable. Just plug it to your laptop, powerbank, computer, or other compatible power source to replenish its battery. When fully charged, it can last for up to 3 hours! Need more reasons to get this powerful and practical handheld fan? Check out these awesome benefits: ✅ Comes in 4 modern colors ✅ Specially made from hard-wearing parts to last for longer ✅ Great for hiking, biking and fishing trips ✅ Fantastic choice for travelers Keep the heat away wherever you go. Add the Comfort Zone Handheld Rechargeable Fan to your cart TODAY!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comfort Zone Comfort Zone is a brand in the home environment category. With dedicated Engineering and Quality teams to ensure our products meet strict quality standards such as UL, ETL, SAA, CE, CSA and NOM, Comfort Zone heaters, fans and humidifiers provide safe performance with value and innovation. Comfort Zone is America's Heating and Cooling Choice. 4" Personal Rechargable Wand Fan, White CZPF402WT-EU 3 speed control USB powered or rechargeable battery powered (both included) Runs up to 3 hours per charge Perfect for desktop use in your home, office or dorm room with the included base Portable for use as a handheld personal fan while on the go

Additional Features Personalized Comfort Our heaters offer options to keep you warm and comfortable when you need it. Each heater is designed to bring you performance in a wide variety of styles and features. Trusted Performance With over 20 years of success, Comfort Zone is a national brand, that provides quality products. A Brand You Can Trust Dedicated to safety and reliability, our product meet strict global standards and provide a safe and reliable performance. We Stand Behind our Products Comfort Zone stands behind the quality and performance of our products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product! Battery life is not all that great.
reviews.reviewText: I love using this product for drying my lashes every time I wash them! It’s handheld, light weight, and cordless. Although it comes with its own stand I think that should have made it rechargeable instead of just to hold it up right while it charges. Additionally, the battery life could be longer but it’s not a big issue for me because I don’t use it for anything but my lashes. However, if you plan to use this for some kind of outdoor summer event to keep cool. Expect to have it die on you at least halfway through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A gift to a Southerner
reviews.reviewText: Living in the South, it gets hot, great product. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this fan to use while putting my makeup on, it is the perfect size for travel, and also works great for hot flashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for size and maintains battery well enough
reviews.reviewText: This fan is fairly strong for its size and comes with a stand so that it need not be held when used. The battery lasts for a few hours and is good enough for most situations I've used it in. The fan feels somewhat cheap, but it is inexpensive so it's to be expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy my mini fan I put it in my purse take it to work outside gathering it works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have only had this fan since the end of February. It stopped working today. It turns on for 2 seconds before shutting off. Even when plugged in. It won’t take a charge either. I only use the fan about once a week for about 2 hours. Disappointed because it worked well and was the perfect color for my work desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's nice for drying eyelashes. I mainly use it to dry Hard Wax when i'm doing Brazilians & Underarms (or keeping someones area dry from sweat). I like slower drying waxes but sometimes I need to speed the drying time up. I also like to have this fan around for if I get hot while blow-drying clients hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this fan. It is powerful and cute.
